ability.name: Tough Crowd
ability.flavor: Your fans don't seem to like the opening act...

metadata.flavor: Your fans don't seem to like the opening act...

effect.name: Effect
effect.effect: The area is haunted by a swirling horde of phantoms until the end of the encounter. Allies can enter any square of the area without spending movement. At the end of each of your turns, you can make one power roll that targets each enemy in the area.

effect.t1: 5 corruption damage; M < WEAK, pull 1 toward the center of the area
effect.t2: 9 corruption damage; M < AVERAGE, pull 2 toward the center of the area
effect.t3: 12 corruption damage; M < STRONG, pull 3 toward the center of the area
